title: Teemoing website
body: so i dont understand how the sacrificing to the dark yordle works like i press the button but nothing happens

replies.body:
OP, do you have a touch-sceen?  If so the mouse won't work.
(I've tested it on 3 rigs, same result).

You keep hitting the button. At some point, something cool will happen. ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9UBJbzAE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-21T04:09:33.150+0000)
>
> You keep hitting the button. At some point, something cool will happen. ^.^
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

It's true  i have a touchscreen laptop as well and it doesn't work with an attached mouse. I have to tap the screen manually. Is this intended?
That's interesting, I hadn't heard of that issue before. I don't think if it's intentional, but I appreciate you bringing this to my attention.
